parameter.name: addSummaryToMetadata
parameter.description: Set the value to 'true' to include field summary statistics in the response. By default it is ‘false’.

parameter.name: resultCount
parameter.description: The maximum number of results to return

parameter.name: searchId
parameter.description: String to specify the search ID

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: A field to return for the event set.

parameter.name: fieldList
parameter.description: Specify a comma-separated list of the fields to return for the event set.

parameter.name: resultOffset
parameter.description: The first result (inclusive) from which to begin returning data.

parameter.name: outputFormat
parameter.description: Valid values: (atom | csv | json | json_cols | json_rows | raw | xml). Specifies the format for the returned output.
